block.p: Carlton Communications said it had agreed to buy HTV, which broadcasts channel ITV to Wales and western England, from Granada Media for $:181 million, or $263 million, cash and Carlton's 20 percent stake in Meridian, the ITV broadcaster for southeastern England, of which Granada already owns 80 percent. HTV has 4.5 million viewers and had operating profit of $:14 million last year, on $:110 million in advertising sales. After the acquisition, Carlton Communication's stations will account for 40 percent of ITV's advertising revenue, and just more than 10 percent of total television viewing.
